choices.text:
Who is less bad: republicans, democrats, or libertarians?
I don't know what a "republican" is, but I can tell you that the answer to your question depends on how we define “bad”.  If by "bad", you mean someone who lies, cheats, and steals, then all three of those political ideologies are equally bad. If instead you mean someone who does not care about other people or their well-being, then democracies would be the least bad option because they tend to have more social welfare programs that benefit everyone in society (e.g., healthcare).
